metadata.name: get_url_swf_3
metadata.description: Tests ActionGetURL opcode (0x83) - Comprehensive test of URL loading functionality including edge cases for different URL schemes, targets, and special characters. In NO_GRAPHICS mode, verifies correct parsing and logging of URL requests.
missing_features: Actual URL loading (requires browser integration or HTTP client)
SWF file loading into _level targets (requires SWF loader and level management)
